mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_RANK, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userRank}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_RANK = #{userRank}, DENY_USE_YN = #{denyUseYN}, UPD_DT = NOW() WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT DENY_USE_YN FROM TB_USER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT IF(A.USER_RANK > B.PRMT_MIN_RANK, 'N', 'Y') AS PRMT_YN, A.DENY_USE_YN FROM (SELECT USER_RANK, DENY_USE_YN FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) A, (SELECT PRMT_MIN_RANK FROM TB_USER_MENU WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}) B
SELECT USER_ID as userId, USER_PW as userPw FROM TB_USER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_RANK, REG_DT, UPD_DT FROM TB_USER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userID}
SELECT UM.MENU_ID, UM.MENU_NAME, CASE U.USER_RANK <= UM.PRMT_MIN_RANK WHEN 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END PRMT_ACCS FROM TB_USER U, TB_USER_MENU UM WHERE 1=1 AND U.USER_ID = #{userId} AND UM.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT USER_ID, USER_RANK, IF(USER_RANK=0, '관리자', '사용자') AS USER_RANK_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT, NVL(DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '') AS UPD_DT, DENY_USE_YN, IF(DENY_USE_YN='Y', '제한', '없음') AS DENY_USE FROM TB_USER ORDER BY USER_RANK, USER_ID
